If you are unable to attend the meeting , we encourage you to complete and return the enclosed CDI Voting Form .

The completed CDI Voting Instruction Form needs to be received at the address shown on the Form not less than 72 hours ( excluding Saturdays , Sundays and holidays ) before the time fixed for the Meeting or an adjournment thereof , being no later than 10:30 am ( Sydney Time ) ( 08:30 am Hong Kong time ) on Friday , 6 June 2014 .
